DOC.detailed_description: The Registry originally initiate 03 May 2005 , part program enhance pharmacovigilance . Following new European Union Pharmacovigilance legislation , pregnancy registry consider post-authorization safety study ( PASS ) . The ongoing Registry therefore convert PASS study . Exposed pregnancy report Registry transition PASS ( 03 May 2005 Q1 2014 ) , data collect analyzed prospectively , also include analysis . Some pregnancy exposure may report pregnancy outcome identify ( retrospective report ) . The Registry capture retrospective report , report include analysis prospective report . Pregnancy outcome data collect use questionnaire within 3 month estimate date delivery ( EDD ) approximately 6 month 12 month EDD ( live birth ) ascertain presence birth defect diagnose , Q1 2014 Q4 2018 .
